T02D1454:1b-1: shr'i badzra satva n'a ma s'a dha nam /
T02D1454:1b-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1454:1b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1454:1b-5: rnal 'byor [dd] pa dbang rnam pa bzhi tshul bzhin du thob cing /
T02D1454:1b-6: dam tshig rnams srog gi phyir yang mi gtong bas /
T02D1454:1b-10: dur khrod la sogs par gnas la /
T02D1454:1b-11: nang par dang por da ma ru'i sgras ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1454:1b-12: de nas lag pa g-yas pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub snying gar bstan la /
T02D1454:1b-13: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:1b-14: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:1b-15: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:1b-16: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a na badzra bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:1b-17: de nas gdong bkru ba la sogs pas khrus byas nas stan 'jam pa la 'dug la /
T02D1454:1b-18: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1454:1b-19: bde ba ma thob pa'i sems can rnams bde ba dpag tu med pa la dgod par bya'o //
T02D1454:1b-20: de ltar gzhan gyi sems can thams cad gsal ba'i sems kyis snying rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-0: de ltar gzhan gyi don bya ba'i sdug @2a * //
T02D1454:2a-1: bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i dga' ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-2: phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa la btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-3: de nas rang gi bdag po'i sa bon las 'od
T02D1454:2a-4: byung nas nam mkhar 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la
T02D1454:2a-5: mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-6: smon pa'i sems kyis bdag he ru kar bsgyur la /
T02D1454:2a-7: sems can thams cad he ru kar gyur cig ces pas smon lam bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-8: smon pa'i sems kyis de nas g-yo ba dang mi
T02D1454:2a-9: g-yo ba'i chos thams cad gcig dang du ma dang
T02D1454:2a-10: bral ba'i ngo bor rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar
T02D1454:2a-11: bsgom mo // sems brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-12: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02D1454:2a-13: de nas bdag gi sdom pa dang /
T02D1454:2a-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis bgegs bskrad par bya ste /
T02D1454:2a-15: mdun gyi nam mkha' la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D1454:2a-16: de'i steng du h'um bsams te /
T02D1454:2a-17: de las 'od 'phros pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D1454:2a-18: de nas rdo rje'i rab dang bla re dang phur bu rnams kyis phyogs bcing ngo //
T02D1454:2a-19: de nas 'jug pa'i sems kyis shin tu yang cha
T02D1454:2b-0: phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo @2b mi dmigs
T02D1454:2b-1: so // aa a'a aa a'i au a'u ae aee
T02D1454:2b-2: ao aoo aam aa: aa ka tsa ta ta pa
T02D1454:2b-4: de dag gyur pa las h'um /
T02D1454:2b-5: de chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya gru gsum brtsegs mar bsams la /
T02D1454:2b-6: de'i dbus su shr'i he ru ka /
T02D1454:2b-7: b'a r'a h'i dang gnyis su med par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1454:2b-8: dpal he ru ka phyag bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa /
T02D1454:2b-9: zhal g-yas dkar g-yon ljang dbus mthing nag / rgyab ser ljang //
T02D1454:2b-10: zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum dang ldan pa /
T02D1454:2b-11: phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bzung bas 'khyud pa //
T02D1454:2b-12: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na kha tv'am ga /
T02D1454:2b-13: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na ka p'a la bsnams pa
T02D1454:2b-14: / thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D1454:2b-15: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan pa /
T02D1454:2b-16: zla ba phyed pa'i gzugs can /
T02D1454:2b-17: spyi bor mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
T02D1454:2b-18: thod pa'i phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa /
T02D1454:2b-19: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
T02D1454:2b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D1454:2b-28: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can /
T02D1454:2b-29: yum b'a r'a h'i mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1454:2b-31: gcer bu skra grol ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs can /
T02D1454:2b-32: phyag gnyis na gri gug dang ka p'a la thogs te /
T02D1454:2b-34: zhabs g-yon gyis 'khyud pa g-yas brkyang ba'o //
T02D1454:2b-35: brgya byin gyis phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma /
T02D1454:2b-36: nor bdag phyogs su l'a ma /
T02D1454:2b-37: chu bdag phyogs su dum skyes ma /
T02D1454:2b-38: gshin rje'i phyogs su gzugs can ma /
T02D1454:2b-39: lha mo de rnams kyang kha dog nag mo dang /
T02D1454:2b-43: spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1454:2b-44: phyag dang po na gri gug / gnyis pa na thod pa //
T02D1454:2b-45: g-yon pa na ka p'a la /
T02D1454:2b-46: gnyis pa na kha tv'am ga / gcer bu skra bshig pa /
T02D1454:2b-51: srin mo gdan du bting bas g-yon brkyang ba g-yas bskum pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1454:2b-53: thod pa se ral khar 'phyang ba'o //
T02D1454:2b-54: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni /
T02D1454:2b-55: he ru ka'i zhal bzhi ni /
T02D1454:3a-5: yang rnam par thar pa bzhi ste /
T02D1454:3a-12: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1454:3a-20: phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar ba'o //
T02D1454:3a-21: dpal he ru ka'i bzhugs gnas dbus kyi lte ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o //
T02D1454:3a-22: gru gsum gyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o ;
T02D1454:3a-23: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsibs stod pa gnyis sems dang /
T02D1454:3a-25: me tog gis bkang ba'i dung chen po gnyis gzhag go //
T02D1454:3a-26: bdag nyid ni mgon po he ru ka ste byang chub sems kyi gzugs can no //
T02D1454:3a-27: de nas bdag gis ye shes sems dpa' bsgom mo //
T02D1454:3a-28: de nas d'a ki la sogs pa'i rigs lnga la
T02D1454:3a-29: sogs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems
T02D1454:3a-30: dpa' spyan drangs nas bdag gi khar zhugs te /
T02D1454:3a-31: snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa' la thim ste /
T02D1454:3a-32: gnyis su med par bsam mo //
T02D1454:3a-33: de nyid las he ru ka'i sku phra mo 'phros pas /
T02D1454:3a-34: de rnams kyi dpal gyis reg pa'i sems can thams
T02D1454:3a-35: cad shr'i he ru ka'i bdag nyid du bzhugs par
T02D1454:3a-36: bsams la / de nas go cha drug gis lus bsrung /
T02D1454:3a-38: na ma hi bee ro tsa n'i sv'a h'a /
T02D1454:3a-39: sv'a h'a h'u padma na rte shva ra /
T02D1454:3a-40: boo sha ta he he ru ka / h'um h'um ho badzra s'u rya /
T02D1454:3a-41: phat ham aa mo gha / aom bam badzra b'a r'a h'i /
T02D1454:3a-44: hrem hri santr'a sa ni h'um h'um sanytsa li ni /
T02D1454:3a-45: phat phat tsandi ka / aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3a-46: aom badzra bee ro tsa na ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3a-47: aom badzra d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3a-48: aom badzra l'a ma ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3a-49: aom badzra khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3a-50: aom badzra m'a yi tshh'i h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3a-52: bde ba chen po'i gnas 'di la zhal gcig la nyi ma phyed ma //
T02D1454:3a-53: snga dro'am de'i phyed la sogs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1454:3a-54: de nas ldang bar 'dod na gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1454:3a-56: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stam dri shya ho:/
T02D1454:3a-57: rdo rje snyim pa kha phye ste /
T02D1454:3a-58: mtshan phyed na gtor mi sbyin no //
T02D1454:3a-59: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1454:3b-0: sarb'a yaksha @3b r'aksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa /
T02D1454:3b-3: badzra d'a ka d'a ki n+ya da ya /
T02D1454:3b-4: ai dam ba lim gri hnam tu sa ma ya raksha ntu /
T02D1454:3b-5: ma ma sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha ntu /
T02D1454:3b-10: ma ma sarba k'a rta ya /
T02D1454:3b-11: sa ta su kham bi shuddha ye /
T02D1454:3b-12: sa ha yi ka bha ba ntu h'um h'um phat /
T02D1454:3b-14: 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog nyid kyis //
T02D1454:3b-16: rtag tu sems ni bzang po yis //
T02D1454:3b-17: sbyor ba'i mchog ni bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1454:3b-18: 'di ni rab tu gseng ba che //
T02D1454:3b-19: gzhan du bstan par mi bya ste //
T02D1454:3b-20: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba dang //
T02D1454:3b-21: mchog gi bsgom pa sbyar bar bya //
T02D1454:3b-22: rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya //
T02D1454:3b-23: bza' dang bza' min gnyis mi bya //
T02D1454:3b-24: bgrod dang bgrod min mi bya ste //
T02D1454:3b-26: 'di ltar ye shes goms pa las /
T02D1454:3b-27: sngags ba dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02D1454:3b-28: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed pa ni //
T02D1454:3b-29: rab tu gsang ba'i dngos grub ni //
T02D1454:3b-30: gzhan gyis gsol btab gsal bar byas //
T02D1454:3b-32: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob ba //
T02D1454:3b-33: des ni sems can ma lus pa //
T02D1454:3b-34: don rtogs stobs dang ye shes ni //
T02D1454:3b-35: bsam gyis mi khyab thob par shog / bde mchog
